attributes.action: Reinstate Professor David Nutt as the government's chief drug adviser
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prof. David Nutt was asked to resign as the government's chief drug advisor on Friday 30 October 2009 after 

We believe it is immoral, dangerous and anti-scientific to remove someone from post for challenging the status-quo with scientific evidence.

As such, we petition the Prime Minister to reinstate Professor David Nutt as the government's chief drug adviser.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
